summary: An email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to the Bureau of Prisons regarding arrangements for her client Ghislaine Maxwell to participate in a telephonic court conference scheduled for the following day. The email confirms Sternheim's representation of Maxwell and provides updated contact information.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell; sends email to confirm arrangements for Maxwell's participation in an upcoming telephonic court conference.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case; her attorney is confirming arrangements for her to participate in a telephonic court conference.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Copied on the email from Bobbi C. Sternheim regarding arrangements for Ghislaine Maxwell's court participation.

connections.description: Sternheim is identified as Maxwell's attorney, confirming arrangements for her client's court participation.
Everdell is copied on Sternheim's professional email regarding a legal matter.

events.title: Telephonic Court Conference for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A telephonic court conference is scheduled to be held at noon; arrangements are being confirmed for Ghislaine Maxwell's participation.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorney, Bobbi C. Sternheim, was actively representing her as of October 2021.
A telephonic court conference was scheduled for October 21, 2021, requiring coordination with the Bureau of Prisons for Maxwell's participation.
The document shows ongoing legal proceedings in Maxwell's case post-conviction, focusing on logistical arrangements for court appearances.
